005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.PositiveIntegerItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import java.math.BigInteger;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * An atomic Metapath item containing a positive integer data value.
020 */
021public interface IPositiveIntegerItem extends INonNegativeIntegerItem {
022  /**
023   * The integer value "1".
024   */
025  @SuppressWarnings("null")
026  @NonNull
027  IPositiveIntegerItem ONE = valueOf(BigInteger.ONE);
028
029  /**
030   * Get the type information for this item.
031   *
032   * @return the type information
033   */
034  @NonNull
035  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IPositiveIntegerItem> type() {
036    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.POSITIVE_INTEGER.getItemType();
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IPositiveIntegerItem> getType() {
041    return type();
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
046   *
047   * @param value
048   *          a string representing an integer value
049   * @return the item
050   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
051   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
055    try {
056      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.POSITIVE_INTEGER.parse(value));
057    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
058      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
059          null,
060          String.format("Invalid positive integer value '%s'. %s",
061              value,
062              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
063          ex);
064    }
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
069   *
070   * @param value
071   *          an integer value
072   * @return the item
073   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
074   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
075   */
076  @NonNull
077  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull INumericItem value) {
078    return valueOf(value.asInteger());
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
083   *
084   * @param value
085   *          an integer value
086   * @return the item
087   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
088   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
089   */
090  @SuppressWarnings("null")
091  @NonNull
092  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(long value) {
093    return valueOf(BigInteger.valueOf(value));
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
098   *
099   * @param value
100   *          an integer value
101   * @return the item
102   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
103   *           if the provided value is not a positive integer
104   */
105  @NonNull
106  static IPositiveIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
107    if (value.compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO) <= 0) {
108      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
109          null,
110          String.format("Integer value '%s' is negative or zero.", value));
111    }
112    return new PositiveIntegerItemImpl(value);
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
117   *
118   * @param item
119   *          the item to cast
120   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
121   *         cast to this type
122   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
123   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
124   */
125  @NonNull
126  static IPositiveIntegerItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
127    try {
128      return item instanceof IPositiveIntegerItem
129          ? (IPositiveIntegerItem) item
130          : item instanceof INumericItem
131              ? valueOf((INumericItem) item)
132              : valueOf(item.asString());
133    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
134      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
135      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
136    }
137  }
138
139  @Override
140  default IPositiveIntegerItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
141    return cast(item);
142  }
143}
